des: With the Hunonic skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your home appliances by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Hunonic account and discover your devices. When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names: ŞUse the names you previously set up. They are shown in the Hunonic app and can be changed SCreate an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following: §"Alexa, turn on Bedroom." §"Alexa, turn off Bedroom."
